bibl.title: with contributions by Sarah CLACKSON, Barry KEMP, Gillian PYKE and Richard REECE, Late Roman Pottery at Amarna and Related Studies.
bibl.note: 1 carte en front., tabl., profils, figg., cartes, plans.
Fouilles de l'E.E.S. à Kôm el-Nana (monastère au sud d'Amarna), 1988. - 7 contributions. - Pp. 3-5: Introduction; - 275-282: References. - Un second vol. est en préparation.
bibl.seg: FAIERS Jane, with contributions by Sarah CLACKSON, Barry KEMP, Gillian PYKE and Richard REECE, Late Roman Pottery at Amarna and Related Studies. (Excavation Memoirs. 72.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2005, 4°, vi-282 pp., 1 carte en front., tabl., profils, figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 0-85698-162-1. £60.
Fouilles de l'E.E.S. à Kôm el-Nana (monastère au sud d'Amarna), 1988. - 7 contributions. - Pp. 3-5: Introduction; - 275-282: References. - Un second vol. est en préparation.
C.R. par Pascale Ballet, ChrEg 83 (2008) Nos 165-166, pp. 187-192. - M. Cristina Guidotti, BibO 64 (2007) coll. 653-656. - Roberta Tomber, JEA 94 (2008) pp. 325-327.
